attributes.review: Think about it: did he ever make America great? No ! this is the worst app! I can’t do anything productive on it! It just full of hypocrisy and it takes way too long to load it crashes a lot. Why would any one wanna get this app? It’s the worst app I have on my phone. I hate this app so much I don’t even like it! This app should burn in hell!
attributes.title: This god forsaken app should burn in hell !😡🤬🙄🤥👺👹👿

attributes.review: I really just wanted this app so that I could keep up with my president, and listen to all the important news that he wants me to hear. But this app itself it’s terrible!! It glitches all the time, takes my personal information and gives it to some rando company that sends me text messages and scam calls. The app even killed my dear teddy😿😿. I DONT RECCOMEND this app to any sane human👁👄👁
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!

attributes.review: Once I opened this app it made my phone glitch out. I did everything I could do to try and fix my phone. However, it would not go back to normal. I had to get a new phone because of this app. Might I add my previous phone was in very good condition and could’ve lasted me another couple of years. I do not recommend getting this app. 🤢✨
attributes.title: DO NOT GET.

attributes.review: In this app I was searching for reasons to vote for trump, but found that all he has done for us has been making us pay extra taxes and has taken many Medicare’s from other people. So This app is for the people who support trumps wrong actions. This app is not for me. And the fact that the president even made an app to support him is even depressing.
attributes.title: This app is not good

attributes.review: It’s took literal HOURS to download, and when it finally open in started playing loud music, it woke up my mom and she had to go back to bed and then she was late for work. Later I went to go and see reasons why people should vote for Trump again, and all that was there was pictures of cats. I’m not even kidding i will NEVER download this again.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: i wanted to get this app to support papi trump, this app took 2 weeks to download and when i opened it a weird orange figure appeared that image stayed in my brain and i see it everywhere now i had to be rushed to the ER to get a surgery done. after the surgery the imagine was not gone now i see an orange figure everywhere now i can’t sleep or eat i am dying thanks to the app❤️thanks papi trump ❤️
attributes.title: cause trauma❤️

attributes.review: I’d like to star of with this app is supporting a misogynistic and racist man who quite honestly doesn’t need anymore support than the tons of cult followers he already has 😌. This man has been moving our country back and not forwards so why is this even an app don’t vote trump for the love of god, that he doesn’t believe in, but, felt the need to have a little photo shoot with the Bible.
attributes.title: Dear silly goose Cheeto:

attributes.review: this app is awful and also runs INSANELY slow. it also took personal information stored in my phone and started MAILING me trump propaganda!! i also started getting calls and texts at the most ridiculous hours all day EVERYDAY!! eventually my phone began to stop working and i couldn’t figure out the source until i deleted this app. DONT get it!!!
attributes.title: don’t get

attributes.review: i wanted to see what this app was all about, i am very disappointed. The app took very long to download and not to mention the glitches and crashing. The fact that apple still hasn’t taken down the app is out of this world. While using the app i got messages from weird numbers, download at your own risk.
attributes.title: disappointed

attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch it made it big out and it kept showing an orange i like oranges and all but this one looked old and it looked like it had mold on it just on the top it made my phone blink and kept getting off the app I can’t believe what this all did to my phone it hurt my phone more then it helped and it hurt my eyes 👀
attributes.title: ❌❌❌do not get this app❌❌
